title: A Check-In on the Queer Community
itunes:title: A Check-In on the Queer Community
description:
In recent years, we've seen a wave of anti-LGBTQ+ bills in the United States. We take a look at some examples, talk about why it's happening, how it impacts mental health, and discuss some wins in the queer community.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

itunes:keywords: stuff mom never told you, momstuff, mom stuff, anney reese, smnty, feminism, feminist, activism, social justice, samantha mcvey, pride month, queer, don't say gay, anti-trans laws, lgbtq+ laws, gay marriage, roe v wade, gender affirming care, gender dysmorphia
